BOOLEAN Zi8InputMapper::Notify (  NotificationType  type,
INT  index,
const AtomItem *  item = 0
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked by the editor, if an item has been inserted or the content of the editor has been changed. Overwriting this method allows the input mapper to synchronize its buffer with the editor-content.

Reimplemented from InputMapper.

BOOLEAN Zi8InputMapper::OnKeyUp (  KeyCode  key_code,
UINT32  duration
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked by the editor when a key has been released.

Reimplemented from InputMapper.

BOOLEAN Zi8InputMapper::OnLongKeyPress (  KeyCode  key_code  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked by the editor when a key has been a long time. It is assured that InputMapper::OnKeyDown with the matching key code is invoked before.

Reimplemented from InputMapper.
